thread.title: Easybook Announces Online Ticketing Service from KL to Johor
thread.title_full: Easybook Announces Online Ticketing Service from KL to Johor

author: prbuzz.com
title: Easybook Announces Online Ticketing Service from KL to Johor
text:
When you choose an exhilarating bus journey from Kuala Lumpur to Johor, nothing can be better than booking an express coach on Easybook. You can now avail the best budget and the fastest bus transportation option through Easybook. Easybook offers you booking options for an innumerable buses plying from Kuala Lumpur to Johor .
Easybook is a reputed online ticket booking portal which offers more than 10000 bus departures per day to more than 6000 routes around Malaysia, Singapore and Thailand. The online ticket booking portal offers you myriad options of coach types, coach sizes timings and prices to choose from. Bus tickets can be purchased without much hassle and without standing in a long queue fighting for your ticket to the cruise. Also, you can have your desired seats and travel at your own suitable timing since Easybook offers you a wide options of bus timings to choose from.
Johor, located on the southern tip of peninsular Malaysia, is well connected by luxurious and comfortable express bus coaches from Kuala Lumpur. The fare fits your budget and the buses ply from morning 5:30 am to the midnight.
Easybook has partnerships with a number of reputed companies providing bus services from Kuala Lumpur to Johor . The various associations with Easybook are Konsortium Bas Express, S&S International Express, Sri Maju group, Cepat and Cekap Express, Supernice Grassland, JB Transliner and Transnasional. These bus companies provide more than 35 schedules everyday. The best part is all these buses can be booked through Easybook.
For more information on buses plying from Kuala Lumpur to Johor, pay a visit to www.easybook.com .
